title: Expected Argument 'c' when launching. League will not launch.

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
I patched to 6.24 of whatever the most recent is as of today. 

Everything was fine and I queued up for a game, picked my champ, and when the game was loading instead of the champion screen I got a black screen. 

I ended up having to force close, and I've tried a system restart. 

Now when I try to open league it gives me this. 

If I go into my program files and try to directly open the launcher or launcher as admin that will open, but when I hit launch to launch the client this error pops up. 

Windows 7 64bit.

replies.body: im having the same problem. windows 7 64 bit as well

Hey there,

Could you try downloading the Hextech Repair Tool and selecting the **Force Repatch** option before hitting start.

After the tool completes could you please launch the client as Admin (Right click, run as Admin) and let me know if this helps.
Same with me, please solve this. NEED TO PLAY THIS GAME :P
